Sentencas: The usefulness of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) for a large vessel is evaluated by estimating the amount of CO2 emitted by a crude oil tanker.
Titulo: Analysis of solid oxide fuel cell hybrid power system in marine application for CO2 reduction

Sentencas: Conventional and two SOFC hybrid power generation systems are proposed and analyzed.
Titulo: Analysis of solid oxide fuel cell hybrid power system in marine application for CO2 reduction

Sentencas: The traditional system consists of five generators and a steam boiler, whereas two SOFC hybrid systems are made up of five smaller generators with additional SOFC power and a steam boiler.
Titulo: Analysis of solid oxide fuel cell hybrid power system in marine application for CO2 reduction

Sentencas: The performance of the SOFC is calculated through a zero-dimensional model developed, including electrochemical stack model.
Titulo: Analysis of solid oxide fuel cell hybrid power system in marine application for CO2 reduction

Sentencas: The CO2 emission of the SOFC hybrid system is estimated depending on the SOFC capacity, 2.5 MW and 5.0 MW.
Titulo: Analysis of solid oxide fuel cell hybrid power system in marine application for CO2 reduction

Sentencas: CO2 emissions in the SOFC hybrid system are 5.4% similar to 8.8% lower than in the traditional structure for one round trip sail.
Titulo: Analysis of solid oxide fuel cell hybrid power system in marine application for CO2 reduction

Sentencas: The reduction of CO2 comes from two factors; the high efficiency of SOFC and the operations of DF generators at a relatively high load rate.
Titulo: Analysis of solid oxide fuel cell hybrid power system in marine application for CO2 reduction

Sentencas: The SOFC hybrid system can be an eco-friendly technology to reduce the CO2 emissions of the large ships.(c) 2023
Titulo: Analysis of solid oxide fuel cell hybrid power system in marine application for CO2 reduction
